Subject: Costume Contest
Description: This year we are making the costume contest a little more informal. This means no Muster, Paperwork, or Registration. You simply show up at the Geek Prom at the right time (9:45!) and say you want to enter. From there it is in the hands of our MC and N.U.E.T.! Come down for some fun and awesome costumes, and maybe enter for a chance to win some cool prizes. Best of Show will receive a free badge to Penguicon 2016!  Speakers include:Alex Drummer, Justin Coluzzi, Kevin McLeod, Albert Manero, Ruth Suehle, Alex Page - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Microphone, Sound System
